body_html: Note that NVIDIA cub was added as a dependency in this comment and contains primitives for radix sorting ints and floats. Some thought will be required to see if this can be extended to complex numbers.
body_text: Note that NVIDIA cub was added as a dependency in this comment and contains primitives for radix sorting ints and floats. Some thought will be required to see if this can be extended to complex numbers.
body: Note that [NVIDIA cub](https://nvlabs.github.io/cub/) was added as a dependency in [this comment](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commits/e073322452e41e76754314aa75d543d071003fc5/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/patches/cub/CMakeLists.txt) and contains primitives for radix sorting ints and floats. Some thought will be required to see if this can be extended to complex numbers.
